title: Network Engineer II
full_description: Clearance: Public TrustLocation: Long Island, NYC Title: Network Engineer Clearance: Public TrustExperience managing data networks, cloud infrastructure, possessing advanced skills and knowledge in routing, switching, and load balancing and firewall management; Storage, Cisco, Cloud environment.Bachelors and must have a minimum of 7 years of related experience Masters and five (5) years or more of related experienceNotes: The candidate should be a well rounded solid Network Engineer Will have the opportunity to be exposed all aspects of environment Really need to be all things Infrastructure Aruba is the wireless network. Any Azure and Disaster Recovery experience would be a huge plus.ABBTECH is an EOE/Minorities/Women/Disabled Individuals/Veterans
